duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of Sales Support and Group Sales agents across the US, Canada, and South America region.
Provide operational support, guidance, and mentorship to the local LAX team as well as overseas contractors.
Help shape the overall strategy across the North America Leisure Industry, OTA, and Cruise sector.
Ensure Qantas’ unique selling propositions continue to maximize revenue.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
